images.place: Dim Sum Cafe, Las Vegas, Nevada

description:
Crab claws with the meat exposed, covered in shrimp paste, breaded and deep fried. The claw pincers retain their shell and act as a handle. Like a crab popsicle.

**Characters**

[炸](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/炸) is *deep-fried*, [蟹](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/蟹) is *crab*m, and [鉗] is [pincer](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/鉗) (also the word for *pliers*). So 炸蟹鉗 is *deep-fried crab pincer*.
